item.title: [HTB] Machine: Trick
item.description:
Trick

└─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.11.166 -T4
Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-08-29 10:59 BST
Stats: 0:13:46 elapsed; 0 hosts completed (1 up), 1 undergoing Connect Scan

53/tcp open domain
80/tcp open http

└─$ nmap -Pn -p22,25,53,80 -sC -sV 10.10.11.166 -T4

| 2048 61:ff:29:3b:36:bd:9d:ac:fb:de:1f:56:88:4c:ae:2d (RSA)
| 256 9e:cd:f2:40:61:96:ea:21:a6:ce:26:02:af:75:9a:78 (ECDSA)

|_smtp-commands: debian.localdomain, PIPELINING, SIZE 10240000, VRFY, ETRN, STARTTLS, ENHANCEDSTATUSCODES, 8BITMIME, DSN, SMTPUTF8, CHUNKING

|_ bind.version: 9.11.5-P4-5.1+deb10u7-Debian

|_http-server-header: nginx/1.14.2

item.title: [HTB] Machine: GoodGames
item.description:
GoodGames

Enumeration

  • nmap
└─$ nmap -sC -sV -Pn 10.10.11.130 -T4
Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-08-21 19:43 BST
Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.130 (10.10.11.130)
Host is up (0.14s latency).
Not shown: 999 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)
PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION
80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.51
|_http-title: GoodGames | Community and Store
|_http-server-header: Werkzeug/2.0.2 Python/3.9.2
Service Info: Host: goodgames.htb
Service detection performed. Please report any incorrect results at https://nmap.org/submit/ .
Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 28.73 seconds
  • gobuster
└─$ gobuster dir -u http://goodgames.htb -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/directory-list-2.3-medium.txt -t 50 -x txt --exclude-length 9265
===============================================================
Gobuster v3.5
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================

[+] Method: GET
[+] Threads: 50
[+] Wordlist: /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/directory-list-2.3-medium.txt

[+] Exclude Length: 9265
[+] User Agent: gobuster/3.5
[+] Extensions: txt
[+] Timeout: 10s
===============================================================

===============================================================

/login (Status: 200) [Size: 9294]
/profile (Status: 200) [Size: 9267]
/signup (Status: 200) [Size: 33387]
